message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Given its value, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. However, I understand the importance of finding the right price point for both parties. Therefore, I propose a special introductory offer of $15,000 for this product. This price not only reflects its true worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a slightly higher value than its intrinsic worth to you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way we can further discuss to find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Looking forward to your positive response.
